summary: Frontend refactoring verification complete - All 11 extracted components working correctly. Backend 13/13 tests passed. Frontend UI verified through Playwright automation.

issues: Shadow style props deprecation warning: 'shadow*' props are deprecated. Use 'boxShadow'. This is a cosmetic warning and doesn't affect functionality.

critical_code_review_comments: All 11 extracted components (SwrMeter, SmithChart, PolarPattern, ElevationPattern, Dropdown, ElementInput, ResultCard, SpecSection, styles, types, constants) are properly imported and working
Barrel export in components/index.ts correctly exports all components and types
Backend APIs unchanged and fully functional - /api/calculate, /api/auto-tune both return correct data
SWR Bandwidth chart renders with frequency data correctly
Smith Chart displays impedance data (R, X, Gamma, L, C values)
Performance Metrics (Gain, F/B, F/S, Efficiency) display correctly
Pattern Analysis shows signal levels at various angles
Reflected Power Analysis section shows power calculations
Element Spacing controls (V.Short/Short/Normal/Long/V.Long presets) visible and functional
Feed Match selector (Direct/Gamma/Hairpin) toggles correctly with appropriate panels
Gamma Match Design panel appears with all controls (Feedpoint R, Target, Step-Up Ratio, Shorting Bar, Rod Insertion)
Band selector dropdown works with all band options visible
Antenna Orientation buttons (Flat/Vertical/45°/Dual) respond to clicks
Coax feedline selector (Heliax, RG-213, etc.) options visible
context_for_next_testing_agent: Frontend refactoring complete and verified. 11 components extracted from index.tsx to separate files under frontend/components/. All components rendering correctly. Backend APIs unchanged. Shadow style deprecation warning is cosmetic only. Vite files removed. App functions identically to before refactoring.

Extracted Components.SwrMeter: SWR Bandwidth chart rendering correctly with frequency data
Extracted Components.SmithChart: Impedance display with R, X, Gamma, L, C values
Extracted Components.Dropdown: Band selector and other dropdowns functional

Backend APIs./api/calculate: Returns gain_dbi, swr, fb_ratio, far_field_pattern, swr_curve, smith_chart_data
Backend APIs./api/subscription/tiers: Returns tiers object with all subscription levels
Backend APIs./api/app-update: Returns version info for update checking

UI Sections Verified.Band Selector: 11m CB default, dropdown shows all bands
UI Sections Verified.Gamma Match Design: Panel appears with Feedpoint R, Target, Step-Up Ratio, Shorting Bar, Rod Insertion controls
UI Sections Verified.Element Spacing: V.Short, Short, Normal, Long, V.Long presets and nudge buttons
UI Sections Verified.SWR Bandwidth: Chart renders with usable bandwidth zones
UI Sections Verified.Elevation Pattern: Side view with take-off angle info
UI Sections Verified.Performance Metrics: Gain (11.62 dBi), F/B (13.1 dB), F/S (7.6 dB), Efficiency (85%)
UI Sections Verified.Reflected Power: Return Loss, Mismatch Loss, Power calculations
